name: sspace-standard
description:
SSPACE standard is a stand-alone program for scaffolding pre-assembled
contigs using NGS paired-read data Note: A manual download is required
for SSPACE-Standard. Spack will search your current directory for the
download file. Alternatively, add this file to a mirror so that Spack
can find it. For instructions on how to set up a mirror, see
https://spack.readthedocs.io/en/latest/mirrors.html
